mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT productName,a.accountNo,balance,TO_CHAR(trDate,'YYYY-MM-DD')lastTrDate,interestRate FROM account a JOIN product p on a.productIdx = p.productIdx JOIN depositProduct d ON d.productIdx = a.productIdx JOIN transaction t ON a.accountNo = t.accountNo WHERE memberIdx = 6 ORDER BY trDate DESC )WHERE ROWNUM =1;
